elements.name: User validates the content of the uploaded text files

steps.name: user is on the login page
user login with valid credentials
user click on "Sign In" button
user should land on the dashboard
user searches for any existing assistant "anitaassistant"
user should see details about assistant
user clicks on assistant Project details
user should see the main panel of the assistant
user clicks on the "Content " section
user clicks on "Text" file
user click on "Upload Text" button
user enters content title as "Content Testing"
user enters the text content "This is a sample text content for testing purposes."
user click on "Save" button
user should be able to see success message as "File updated successfully"

name: Upload text, search,edit and delete content

steps.name: user is on the login page
user login with valid credentials
user click on "Sign In" button
user should land on the dashboard
user searches for any existing assistant "anitaassistant"
user should see details about assistant
user clicks on assistant Project details
user should see assistant Project page
user clicks on the "Edit" section
user edit "Project Description" as "Functionality testing1 on LLM studio"
user click on "Save" button
user should see success message
user edit "AI Assistant’s Name" as a random value
user click on "Save" button
user should see success message
user edit "Contact Options" as a value
user click on "Save" button
user should see success message
user is on the login page
user login with valid credentials
user click on "Sign In" button
user should land on the dashboard
user is on the login page
user login with Invalid credentials
user click on "Sign In" button
user should be able to see the error message
user is on the login page
user login with empty credentials
user click on "Sign In" button
user should be able to see the warning message
user is on the login page
user click on "Sign Up here" button
user should be redirected to the sign up page
user fills in the sign up form with valid details
user click on "Sign up" button

elements.name: User creates and verifies an Assistant

steps.name: user is on the login page
user login with valid credentials
user click on "Sign In" button
user should land on the dashboard
user click on "+ Create New Assistant" button
provides the assistant name "QAAssistant"
selects the assistant type as "Normal"
clicks on vector database as "AlloyDB"
provides the description "This is used for testing."
user click on "Create" button
the message is displayed, user click the No button
user should be able to see the AI Assistant name
user go back to the main dashboard
user searches for the assistant
user clicks on the options menu for the assistant
user clicks on the "Delete" assistant
user click on "Delete" button
the assistant should be deleted successfully
user should land on the dashboard
user searches for any existing assistant "qaassistant1"
user clicks on the options menu for the assistant
user clicks on the "Archive" assistant
user click on "Archive" button
the assistant should be archived successfully
user clicks the list of assistants
user selects the "Archived Assistant"
user searches for any existing assistant "qaassistant1"
user clicks on search assistant
user clicks on the options menu for the unarchieve assistant
user clicks on the "Unarchive" assistant
user click on "Unarchive" button
the assistant should be unarchived successfully
user should land on the dashboard
user clicks the list of assistants
user selects the "Published Assistant"
user should be able to see the list of filtering assistants
user clicks the list of assistants
user selects the "Archived Assistant"
user should be able to see the list of filtering assistants

name: Create, search and Delete the Assistant

steps.name: user is on the login page
user login with valid credentials
user click on "Sign In" button
user should land on the dashboard
user able to see All policies section
user clicks on All Polices button
user clicks on Create New Policy button
user provides policy name "QAPolicyPack"
selects the policy type as "Normal"
user enters the description "This policy pack is for QA Testing"
user click on "Create Policy Pack" button
user clicks on the created policy pack
user updates the information of the policy pack
user selects the AI Assistant tone as "Friendly"
user enables the toggle button of the file upload
user click on "Update Policy Pack" button
user should be able to see the updated toast message
user go back to the main dashboard
user able to see All policies section
user clicks on All Polices button
user able to see the created policy pack
user clicks on kebab menu of the policy pack
user clicks on delete button of the policy pack
user click on "Delete" button
user should be able to see the deleted toast message
user go back to the main dashboard
user clicks on Instant learning section
user should be able to see instant learning dashboard
user go back to the main dashboard
user clicks on all utility agents section
user should be able to see all the agents

name: Policy Pack Create, Update and delete
